\begin{matlabcode}
Pikudei = [29 730 100 1775 .5 20 603550 100 100 100 1775 70 2400];
Pekudei_st = [
"29 talents 730 shekels [38:24]"
"100 talents 1775 shekels [38:25]"
".5 shekel 20 years old 603550 men [38:26]"
"100 talents, 100 sockets 100 talents [38:27]"
"1775 shekels into hooks [38:28]"
"70 talents 2400 shekels [38:29]"
""
];
\end{matlabcode}


\begin{matlabcode}
%trying to make an array of arrays so that I can access properties of them,
% but it doesnt wor
allparshas_st = ["Bereshit"; "Noach"];
allparshas = [Bereshit Noach];

\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlaboutput}
curr = 1
ans = 1
curr = 2
ans = 1
ans = 1
\end{matlaboutput}


\begin{matlabcode}
%Made a table of the parsha, its length, the max number
%change so that the row name is the parsha name
%make indivi
sz = [length(allparshas_st), 3];
varNames = {'Parsha', 'Length', 'Mode'};
varTypes = {'string', 'double', 'double'};
T = table('Size', sz, 'VariableTypes', varTypes, 'VariableNames', varNames);

for l = 1:length(allparshas_st)
    T(l,:) = {allparshas_st(l), length(Bereshit), 0};
end
T
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabtableoutput}
{
\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
\mlcell{ } & \mlcell{Parsha} & \mlcell{Length} & \mlcell{Mode} \\ \hline
\mlcell{1} & \mlcell{"Bereshitch1"} & \mlcell{53} & \mlcell{0} \\ \hline
\mlcell{2} & \mlcell{"Noach"} & \mlcell{53} & \mlcell{0} \\ 
\hline
\end{tabular}
}
\end{matlabtableoutput}


\begin{matlabcode}
numfunthings = 1;
sz = [numfunthings, 1];
rowNames = {'Longest Parsha'};
varTypes = {'string'};

FunFacts = table('Size', sz, 'VariableTypes', varTypes, 'RowNames',rowNames)
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabtableoutput}
{
\begin{tabular}{|c|c|}
\hline
\mlcell{ } & \mlcell{Var1} \\ \hline
\mlcell{1 Longest Parsha} & \mlcell{<missing>} \\ 
\hline
\end{tabular}
}
\end{matlabtableoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
FunFacts(1,:) = {'Bereshit'}
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabtableoutput}
{
\begin{tabular}{|c|c|}
\hline
\mlcell{ } & \mlcell{Var1} \\ \hline
\mlcell{1 Longest Parsha} & \mlcell{"Bereshitch1"} \\ 
\hline
\end{tabular}
}
\end{matlabtableoutput}
